description:
【EVENT STREAM】THANK YOU FOR 3K!!! CELEBRATORY KARAOKE, ANNOUNCEMENTS & MORE WITH CEO VTUBER

https://twitter.com/obakepam​

Welcome to today’s corporate meeting. Today’s agenda includes:

- CELEBRATING REACHING 3000 SUBSCRIBERS!!! THANK YOU PAMPLOYEES!!!
- It's what you've all been asking for... The opening of Memberships and Superchats! 
- Some SUPER NEAT announcements that you absolutely do NOT want to miss, trust me. (Including updates on the fabled FREE SHIPPING event...)
- Karaoke! Let's sing some songs to celebrate our senpai!
- MAYBE...a short ASMR section...maybe...
- Playing a game with chat, maybe Slither.io??? We'll see.

Hit that subscribe button to join our employee newsletter & get notified about future meetings, also LIKE the video to stay on the boss’ good side!

(っ◔◡◔)っ ——————————————♥

https://twitter.com/obakepam​
HASHTAGS:
- #PAMservice​ (fan art)
- #PAMdemonium​ (general)
- #onlyPAMs​ (NSFW)*
*ANY NSFW art MUST be tagged (#onlyPAMs​) instead of the main fan art tag. Do not use both.

Please use hashtags instead of direct tagging on Twitter! It helps make your posts easier to find & prevents them from getting buried in a sea of replies.

Please note on post if you would prefer your art not be featured in stream or on thumbnails.

(っ◔◡◔)っ ——————————————♥

COMPANY ETIQUETTE [chat rules]:

1. Do not direct customer service questions to PAM. I have no idea what my underlings are up to, I just wanna make my content. Direct such inquiries here https://www.play-asia.com/contact/​​
2. Be chill & civil in chat, no hate speech, slurs, spam, trolling, insensitive remarks etc. If you see such comments, do not engage. Ignore, block and/or report.
3. No doxxing/discussing anyone’s personal information, even if it is public knowledge, regardless if it is a vtuber or user in chat. Let’s respect each others’ privacy.
4. Avoid sensitive topics like politics & religion.
5. Don’t talk about Obake PAM in the chat of any other streams. Respect the streamers and keep topics relevant to their own streams.
6. No spoilers! I play games for the experience, if I know what happens, it will ruin the game for me. Backseat gaming is welcome when I ask.

(っ◔◡◔)っ ——————————————♥

Obake PAM

title: 【EVENT STREAM】...CELEBRATIONS, KARAOKE, PLAYASIA ANNOUNCEMENTS, & MORE (?!) WITH CEO VTUBER
